features.description: Intricate inlay of semi-precious stones and colored glass
Depiction of the nemes headcloth and false beard symbolizing royalty

historical_significance.summary: The mask is a masterpiece of ancient Egyptian art and symbolizes the wealth and craftsmanship of the 18th Dynasty, providing insight into burial practices and royal iconography.
references: Reeves, N. (1990). The Complete Tutankhamun: The King, the Tomb, the Royal Treasure. Thames & Hudson.
